titleStmt.title: To the Reverend Dr. Beveridge, an eucharisticon, occasion'd by his seasonable and excellent sermon about restitution, on *St. Luke 19.8. preach'd at St. Laurence's London, Tuesday, March 17. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Coming by chance into St. Laurence-Kirk,".
On the verso: A copy of a letter sent to the Reverend Dr. Beveridge, upon occasion of the second edition of the paper of remarks upon his sermon about restitution.
P. [2] of item at A1:1[188] appears following item at A1:1[189] (2 p.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
